meanings.sent1: The ghost was substanceless, floating through the walls effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The dream felt substanceless, disappearing as soon as I woke up.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was revealed when the substanceless coin vanished into thin air.
meanings.sent4: Her promises were as substanceless as a cloud, disappearing without a trace.
meanings.sent5: The fog was so substanceless that you could walk right through it.

meanings.sent1: The substanceless gossip didn't interest me at all.
meanings.sent2: His substanceless excuses couldn't convince anyone.
meanings.sent3: The substanceless argument between the siblings made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The substanceless chatter in the background faded into white noise.
meanings.sent5: The substanceless comments were quickly forgotten by everyone.
